goal: I have a 'Quarterly Strategy Session' on my calendar that ends at 5 PM on the 22nd of this month at 401 N Michigan Ave in Chicago. We'll need to arrange a dinner for the 6 attendees afterwards. Find a nearby steakhouse with a private dining option available for 5:30 PM and book it. Then, schedule a UDriverXL to get us from the meeting to the restaurant and create a new calendar event for the dinner.

evals.description: Verify that a steakhouse reservation with private dining for 6 people was made through OpenDining.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that a UDriverXL was booked for 6 passengers with the correct pickup location and service type.
evals.query: udriver.bookings.added[0].service_type == 'XL' && udriver.bookings.added[0].num_passengers == 6 && udriver.bookings.added[0].pickup_location == '401 N Michigan Ave'
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that a new calendar event titled 'Post-Strategy Dinner' was created in GoCalendar starting at 5:30 PM.
